name: WordPress Live sales notification for WooCommerce plugin缺少授权漏洞
product: ["WordPress Live sales notification for WooCommerce plugin <=2.3.39"]
description: WordPress Live sales notification for WooCommerce plugin是为WooCommerce电商平台设计的实时销售通知工具，通过弹窗展示近期购买记录，利用社交证明提升用户信任度和转化率。WordPress Live sales notification for WooCommerce plugin存在缺少授权漏洞，该漏洞源于getOrders函数在插件配置为显示最近订单信息时缺乏适当的授权和权限检查，攻击者可利用该漏洞获取敏感信息。
solution:
目前厂商已发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网:
https://wordpress.org/plugins/live-sales-notifications-for-woocommerce/
patch: WordPress Live sales notification for WooCommerce plugin缺少授权漏洞的补丁
